name: The Last Full Moon
description:
The Last Full Moon is a small (unfinished) endless runner sidescroller.

You play as a woman who has been turned into a werewolf. Trying to resist the craving for killing and eating humans you decide you will never transform again. As such you shall forever run away from the full moon.

The game does not have a tutorial built in.

How to Play:

The goal of the game is to survive for as long as you can.

Use Left and Right to run.

Use Space to Jump and Double Jump.

Use Z to attack.

There are 3 types of obstacles:

- Blue barriers block your path

- Green barriers block your path but can be destroyed by attacking (Z)

- Red obstacles stagger you, reducing your speed for a few seconds.

When the night catches up to you, you start building "Adrenaline" which can be seen in the rightmost red meter, and you start slowing transforming into a werewolf.

A full Adrenaline bar will result in your full transformation into a werewolf and you lose the game.

However having a lot of adrenaline is beneficial for the player:

- When the player has more adrenaline he earns score faster;

- When the player has more adrenaline he moves faster.

Enjoy!
